languages.text: "Да неужели, святоша? А что же, Лорд-капитан нам, значит, привиделась всем? Абеляр, ну скажи хоть ты!.."
"Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"
languages.original_text: "Да неужели, святоша? А что же, Лорд-капитан нам, значит, привиделась всем? Абеляр, ну скажи хоть ты!.."

traits.locale_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"
"Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"
"Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"
"Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"
"Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

languages.text: “真的是这样吗，虔诚的小圣女？怎么，难道我们要假装根本没看到舰长大人站在火中吗？阿贝拉德，你来和她理论理论！”
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: “真的是这样吗，虔诚的小圣女？怎么，难道我们要假装根本没看到舰长大人站在火中吗？阿贝拉德，你来和她理论理论！”

languages.text: «¿Es eso cierto, Adepta Sanctimonious? ¿Qué, vamos a hacer como si no hubiéramos visto a la Lord Capitán entre las llamas? ¡Abelard, dígaselo!».
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es eso cierto, Adepta Sanctimonious? ¿Qué, vamos a hacer como si no hubiéramos visto a la Lord Capitán entre las llamas? ¡Abelard, dígaselo!».

languages.text: 「あらそうなの、シスター？何、あたいたちは火の中に立ってたロード・キャプテンを見て見なかったことにするつもり？アベラルドのおじちゃん、彼女に言ってやって！」
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: 「修道聖女会ですか？ 何、私たちは火の中に立っているロード・キャプテンを見て見なかったことにするつもりですか？ アベラルド、あなたが彼女に言います！」
「あらそうなの、シスター？何、あたいたちは火の中に立ってたロード・キャプテンを見て見なかったことにするつもり？アベラルドのおじちゃん、彼女に言ってやって！」

languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

languages.text: « Ah oui, Adepta Sermonitas ? Alors quoi, on va tous faire semblant de ne pas avoir vu la seigneure-capitaine au beau milieu des flammes ? Dites-lui, Abélard ! »
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah oui, Adepta Sermonitas ? Alors quoi, on va tous faire semblant de ne pas avoir vu la seigneure-capitaine au beau milieu des flammes ? Dites-lui, Abélard ! »

languages.text: "Ist das so, Adepta Scheinheiligus? Tun wir dann einfach so, als hätten wir den Lord Captain gerade nicht mitten im Feuer stehen sehen? Abelard, sagt Ihr es ihr!"
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: "Ist das so, Adepta Scheinheiligus? Tun wir dann einfach so, als hätten wir den Lord Captain gerade nicht mitten im Feuer stehen sehen? Abelard, sagt Ihr es ihr!"

languages.text: "Öyle mi Vaaz Rahibesi? Ne yani? Lord Kaptan'ı alevlerin ortasında görmemiş gibi mi yapacağız? Abelard, bir şey desene!"
languages.original_text: "Is that right, Adepta Sanctimonious? What, we'll just pretend like we didn't see the Lord Captain standing there in the fire? Abelard, you tell her!"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi Vaaz Rahibesi? Ne yani? Lord Kaptan'ı alevlerin ortasında görmemiş gibi mi yapacağız? Abelard, bir şey desene!"
